task_description: Facing the building to your North-West (approx. 304°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I am currently facing the building at a heading of 305°NW, which is close to the target direction; I should look up to assess the height of the building.
I am looking upwards but not towards the correct heading; I should adjust my heading to better align with the building at 304°NW.
I am now correctly facing the building at 304°NW; I should look up to assess the height of the building.
I need to adjust my heading to face the building at 304°NW while maintaining the upward pitch to see the full height.
I am correctly facing the building and looking up at it; I should now move closer to get a better view of its height.
I have moved but my heading is now off; I need to rotate back to face the building at 304°NW while maintaining the upward pitch.
I am now correctly facing the building and looking up; I should move closer to get a better perspective on its height.
